And yet, in a way, it was also a gift - a chance to see the beauty and wonder of life anew, to experience the joy and pain of existence through a fresh perspective. As I watched the child grow and change, I realized that perhaps this was not a curse, but a second chance to appreciate the precious gift of life and the fleeting nature of our time on this earth.
